alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 29 at 2:20PM MDT until August 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES IN THE OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN IDAHO HIGHLANDS... .Winds associated with a cold front will combine with dry conditions creating critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS... WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS... WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... * WINDS...15 to 25 MPH with gusts to 40 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
